# Main

a, op, b = input().split()

if op == "+":
    print(int(a) + int(b))
elif op == "-":
    print(int(a) - int(b))

import sys

input = sys.stdin.readline().split()

a = int(input[0])
b = int(input[2])

if input[1] == "+":
    print(a + b)
else:
    print(a - b)

import sys

int1, op, int2 = sys.stdin.readline().split()
print(eval(int1 + op + int2))
